channel.title: Killing someone results in con lost?
channel.description: Every time someone kills someone the person that killed them loses connection, How do i fix this?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2007, 07:01:20 PM[/size][hr]Anyone there.?

item.title: Killing someone results in con lost?
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

ull d.c either because.

  1. ur clicking to fast.
  2. ur spamming a spall which results in d.c
  3. if theres lots of ppl in the server, then lag will increase cause d.c

there is no possible way to lower it, rather than making a rule to ur server saying to not ice barrage because thats the spell which lags.

Read full topic
item.source: Killing someone results in con lost?

item.title: Killing someone results in con lost?
item.dc:creator: @xsaberjrx xsaberjrx
item.description:
@xsaberjrx wrote:

I know, thats fine, but it disconnects the person that kills them also.

Read full topic
item.source: Killing someone results in con lost?

item.title: Killing someone results in con lost?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

That happens normaly. You cant fix that (atleast Ive never heard of a way to fix it, and Ive been coding for a while). So just stick to it, it makes it fun. If someone dies, and they get connection lost, their items disappear, and that way they cant run back and get them

Read full topic

item.title: Killing someone results in con lost?
item.dc:creator: @jordan7 Jordan7
item.description:
@jordan7 wrote:

Try logging out, or sometimes if you try to attack someone (even if they are in safe zone) it works sometimes
